market.admin

Class Checkout

  • java.lang.Object
    • market.admin.Checkout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Checkout>

    public class Checkout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Checkout>

    Checkout

    This class allows to simulate and model the behavior of a checkout into a supermarket (simulation)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
